code:
# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @param {Integer} k
# @return {Integer}
def count_subarrays(nums, k)
    max_num = nums.max
    counts = 0

    nums.each_with_index do |num, i|
        next if num != max_num
        left = i
        right = i
        while left > 0 && nums[left - 1] >= max_num
            left -= 1
        end
        while right < nums.length - 1 && nums[right + 1] >= max_num
            right += 1
        end
        for l in left..i
            for r in i..right
                if nums[l..r].count(max_num) >= k
                    counts += 1
                end
            end
        end
    end

    counts
end
